text: Va ʙad-in guna [ki ʙa pajomʙaroni pesin kitoʙi osmoni furu firistodem] in kitoʙro [niz] ʙar tu nozil kardem, pas, kasone, ki [pes az tu] ʙa onon kitoʙ [-i osmoni] dodem, ʙa in [Qur'on niz] imon meovarand va az inon [musrikon] kasone hastand, ki ʙa on imon meovarand va cuz kofiron [kase] ojoti Moro inkor namekunad
